author: Ej Carannante
text: '$15 for a vodka soda. Joke of a bar. Bad service and slow
column5: and it smells in here more then other bars (which is bad) one of the worst spots you can go to in Hoboken'

author: Harrison Kanarick
column5: I tried going on Thursday around 9 and it was pitch black. I’ll update my review if I hear otherwise.'

author: The Critical J
text: "PROS: This place was a nice social place to be on the weekend. We weren't able to get into many other places with a party of 7 but this place squeezed us right in. Nice drink menu
column8: bouncers were enforcing CDC guidelines the best they could. Enough bathrooms to cater to the amount of people they have.\n\nCONS: This place brought in way more than the 25% capacity enforced by cdc and it felt like people were on top of each other. Also
column9: the waitress overcharged one of our credit cards when we were splitting the bill and it was never reversed\n\nOVERALL: I will be going back to that place soon
column10: just bring cash and don't be surprised if someone is breathing down your neck due to tight quarters"

author: Jack Hofmann
text: 'Very bad time the bouncers take forever
column5: prices are bad and they just don’t know how to serve drinks'

author: Jack Hofmann
column5: bouncers are mean and make you wait and let anyone in at night
column6: over priced not worth the time'

author: Michael Desousa
text: '5.7...\nIdk maybe just come here for the drinks? Don’t let the picture fool you.'

author: Ashley Moreno
text: 'First time going there last weekend and music is great
column5: some drinks are pricey per usual with bars/clubs. great ambience
